Hello,
Thank you for registering your YETI.
We have confirmed that your product is properly documented. Please allow 3-4 weeks for your complimentary bottle key to arrive.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
